text.__SUMMARY__: Lithocarpus kingianus is a species of plant in the family Fagaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia.
text.References: Chua, L.S.L. (1998). "Lithocarpus kingianus". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31499A9633896. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31499A9633896.en. Retrieved 18 December 2017.
